name: Type-A-Long Mountain
description:
From the makers of Cat Walk, something entirely different: a typing-horror game.

Join five children on  their joyous mountain minecart ride as they travel down the Hall of the Mountain King and write your own ditty along the way. 

There's just one rule:  keep typing (and you don't need  to press the space  bar). 

  • Ernes Railey (@viddezign) - user input, spell checker, and text scrolling
  • Eunice Lim (@Haiyoooo) -  kid manager, kid death, and lyrics text file parsing
  • Zac Emerzian (@Zac E) - scenery, lighting, and lyrics

References: here
